markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Water Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=371)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 384 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target can walk on the surface of water and other liquids without falling through. It can go underwater if it wishes, but in that case it must Swim normally. This spell doesn't grant the ability to breathe underwater.

---
**Heightened (4th)** The spell's range increases to 30 feet, the duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
name: Water Walk

</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 384 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

</row>

---

<summary>
Buoy a creature so it can walk on water.
</summary>
summary: Buoy a creature so it can walk on water.
summary_markdown: Buoy a creature so it can walk on water.
text: Water Walk Source Core Rulebook pg. 384 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 10 minutes --- The target can walk on the surface of water and other liquids without falling through. It can go underwater if it wishes, but in that case it must Swim normally. This spell doesn't grant the ability to breathe underwater. --- Heightened (4th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, the duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
